column6: Think Spider-Man doesn't have to worry about death anymore, having escaped its grasp in THE OTHER? Think again, as Spider-Man finds himself back in the wrestling ring, squaring off against a masked wrestler whose name literally means "Death"!
column8: | writer:Peter David | inker:Karl Kesel | colorist:Paul Mounts | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo
